metadata.name: Visual Basic Command Line Compiler Usage
metadata.comment: Detects successful code compilation via Visual Basic Command Line Compiler that utilizes Windows Resource to Object Converter.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\vbc.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cvtres.exe')))

output.summary: Detects successful code compilation via Visual Basic Command Line Compiler that utilizes Windows Resource to Object Converter.

metadata.objective: False positive: Utilization of this tool should not be seen in enterprise environment Reference: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Vbc/
